title: Polycation-regulated hydrogel electrolytes with nanoscale hydrophobic confinement inducing Zn(002) deposition for highly reversible zinc anodes
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,6640-6655
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01660B, Paper
Xilin Wang, Bin Wang, Pengyang Lei, Xiaorui Wang, Lei Zhou, Junxiang Zhang, Jinyang Zhang, Jianli Cheng
A polycation-regulated hydrogel electrolyte with nanoscale hydrophobic confinement addresses dendrites, corrosion, and lifespan issues in AZIBs by regulating the electric field, enhancing Zn2+ migration, and guiding Zn(002) plane growth.
